snippet: Michelle Obama’s enthusiastic embraces have become a minor phenomenon, with people lining up for hugs at events. Her signature gesture is warm and striking.
abstract: Michelle Obama’s enthusiastic embraces have become a minor phenomenon, with people lining up for hugs at events; signature gesture is a useful metaphor for how Obama approaches the roles of first lady and campaign surrogate, an approach that will be on display when she addresses the Democratic National Convention.
